english.segment1: Every now and then. I need some time to myself. I need some time to think. So I can breathe
english.segment2: Cause out here in the world. You know some things will never change. You're just another number. With a face
english.segment3: So don't fool yourself. Into believing what you see. It's only illusions. A prodigy
english.segment4: I can feel you running through me. It's in my mind and I'm thinking clearly. I can't tell what it is that you do to me. Just look into my eyes and you will see
english.segment6: Through the years I've learned. It's so hard to find. Something to believe in. Peace of mind
english.segment7: So don't fool yourself. Into believing what you see. It's only illusions. A prodigy
